name: Dont be a Sheep
description:
Dont be a sheep, a game about startling your expectations. Help an innocent sheep escape a pen he doesn't belong.

the obvious choice isn't always the right one, it might make you think, well if I had known that.

Things you have to know-- 

WASD movement

E - to interact

Shift - eat berries and berry bushes

Spacebar - Jump

Listen to the console commands, they are your narrator

Danger is sometimes the answer

the axe- grants the power to break down certain trees

the ram horns - grant the power to jump again

the helmet - the answer is on the mountain

the running shoes - run faster when you where shoes.
